object.name: KeyboardButtonRequestUser
object.description: This object defines the criteria used to request a suitable user. The identifier of the selected user will be shared with the bot when the corresponding button is pressed.
object.html_description: This object defines the criteria used to request a suitable user. The identifier of the selected user will be shared with the bot when the corresponding button is pressed. More about requesting users »
object.rst_description: This object defines the criteria used to request a suitable user. The identifier of the selected user will be shared with the bot when the corresponding button is pressed. `More about requesting users Â» <https://core.telegram.org/bots/features#chat-and-user-selection>`_

annotations.description: Signed 32-bit identifier of the request, which will be received back in the UserShared object. Must be unique within the message
annotations.html_description: Signed 32-bit identifier of the request, which will be received back in the UserShared object. Must be unique within the message
annotations.rst_description: Signed 32-bit identifier of the request, which will be received back in the :class:`aiogram.types.user_shared.UserShared` object. Must be unique within the message
annotations.name: request_id

annotations.description: Pass True to request a bot, pass False to request a regular user. If not specified, no additional restrictions are applied.
annotations.html_description: Optional. Pass True to request a bot, pass False to request a regular user. If not specified, no additional restrictions are applied.
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Pass :code:`True` to request a bot, pass :code:`False` to request a regular user. If not specified, no additional restrictions are applied.
annotations.name: user_is_bot

annotations.description: Pass True to request a premium user, pass False to request a non-premium user. If not specified, no additional restrictions are applied.
annotations.html_description: Optional. Pass True to request a premium user, pass False to request a non-premium user. If not specified, no additional restrictions are applied.
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Pass :code:`True` to request a premium user, pass :code:`False` to request a non-premium user. If not specified, no additional restrictions are applied.
annotations.name: user_is_premium
